item.title: Best Roblox Phonk ID Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Roblox offers thousands of different experiences, many of which feature unique gameplay and worlds. Despite this, many of them share similar features, such as the ability to play custom tracks through music items. In this guide, we'll tell you about the best Roblox phonk ID codes.

As an underground hip-hop subgenre, phonk has a unique style that can enhance your gaming experience. Fortunately, players can use specific ID codes to play these tracks, though you'll have to fulfill several requirements to unlock this feature.

Updated October 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Roblox offers a variety of phonk sound IDs you can use in-game to enhance your audio experience. From energetic tracks like Mad Phonk Energy to darker vibes like Phonk of Darkness, thereâ€™s something for every mood. These IDs let you customize your gameplay with unique Phonk beats and intense soundscapes. Keep an eye out for updates, as new sounds may be added to keep your audio setup fresh and exciting.

Best Roblox Phonk ID Codes

Phonk is great for various racing and driving simulators in Roblox . But you can also play it in other experiences, such as RPGs or battlegrounds. Players only need to know the appropriate Roblox phonk ID codes.

All music features in Roblox use ID codes. But there are so many of them that it's almost impossible to listen to them all. So, we've compiled the best Roblox phonk ID codes to save you time. Among them, you're sure to find at least a few tracks to suit your taste.

How to Use Roblox Phonk ID Codes

It's important to note that using phonk ID codes may vary in different Roblox experiences. First of all, the radio or boombox features in games are paid. In other words, before you can play the tracks you want, you'll need to pay Robux for the corresponding game pass. For example, in the Fisch experience, the Radio Gamepass costs 109 Robux.

After spending money, you'll either receive a new item or unlock a new menu option. In either case, players will be able to enter various ID codes and play their favorite tracks while playing Roblox .

item.title: Roblox: Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Roblox allows you to play many different games, and Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden is quite the creative experience. Here, you will be able to capture various dinosaurs and use them to earn cash. Also, you will be able to ride these creatures, and if you want to expand your collection, you will need all the resources available. Fortunately, this game features redeemable codes, and in this guide, we will provide you with the Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden codes for some free loot.

Updated October 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden has added new codes that grant you Potions to boost your progress. These rewards can help you grow your prehistoric garden faster and make your dinosaurs even stronger. The latest update brings fresh opportunities to collect valuable items and improve your setup. Check back soon for more updates and new codes as the game continues to expand.

All Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

Working Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

  • 22vk79 â€“ Gives you Potion. (NEW)
  • 8s029r â€“ Gives you Potion. (NEW)

Expired Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

  • pun3u0
  • ql62e3
  • lllasso
  • lassoooo

In Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden , you can use guns to shoot dinosaurs and capture them. The creatures that you catch can be placed on your plot and used to earn money. Additionally, you can tame such a creature and make it your mount. In order to do this, you will need to use special consumable items called Lassos, and fortunately, some promo codes allow you to get them for free.

We donâ€™t recommend waiting too long before redeeming codes for this Roblox game. If you donâ€™t activate them in time, they will expire, and your freebies will no longer be available.

How to Redeem Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

Promo codes in Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden can provide you with useful items. Luckily, the redemption process in this game is very simple and only requires you to click a few buttons. Follow these steps to activate Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden codes:

  • Launch Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden , and wait for this Roblox experience to load.
  • After that, click on the Code button in the upper right corner of your screen.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem in the menu that pops up.
  • Click on the OK button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

The developers of Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden may add more promo codes in the future, and if this happens, we will update our article. Feel free to bookmark this guide and check it from time to time for new bonuses. Also, you can follow the official Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden media:

  • Discord Server
  • YouTube Channel

item.title: Roblox: Luck Incremental Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Luck Incremental is an engaging Roblox experience that lets you manage different stats and explore various worlds. The game allows you to generate cash and use it to purchase other types of currencies, such as Multi or Rebirths. With their help, you will be able to increase your chances of getting more Luck, which is the main resource in this experience. Also, you can get some free bonuses by using Luck Incremental codes, and in this guide, we will tell you about them.

Updated October 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Luck Incremental has introduced new codes that reward you with Daily Tokens and Gems. These bonuses can help you upgrade faster and take advantage of new features from the latest update. The newest additions celebrate milestones like visits and updates, making now a great time to claim them. Keep an eye out for more codes as the game continues to grow and release new events.

All Luck Incremental Codes

Working Luck Incremental Codes

  • 1MVISITS â€“ Gives you Daily Tokens and Gems. (NEW)
  • UPDATE7 â€“ Gives you Daily Tokens and Gems. (NEW)
  • 100KVISITS â€“ Gives you x100 Daily Tokens and x2,000 Gems.
  • 1KMEMBERS â€“ Gives you x100 Daily Tokens and x2,000 Gems.
  • discordian â€“ Gives you x10 Daily Tokens.

Expired Luck Incremental Codes

  • UPDATE3
  • UPDATE2
  • 10KVISITS
  • RELEASE
  • UPDATE!
  • SORRY4SHUTDOWN

Luck Incremental can be a bit confusing for new players, as there are many different things to keep track of. This experience gives you cash every second, which can be used to increase the amount of resources you receive or converted into other currencies. The main goal is to purchase upgrades that will help you raise your Luck and unlock new content.

Promo codes in Luck Incremental can provide you with various things, including Daily Tokens. They allow you to purchase extra upgrades and are not that easy to get. So, we highly recommend that you redeem coupons as soon as possible before they expire and you lose your tokens.

How to Redeem Luck Incremental Codes

The rewards you can get by using Luck Incremental codes will help you unlock new features and progress faster. Fortunately, they are not that difficult to obtain, and the redemption process can be done in a few seconds. Just follow these steps, and you will quickly claim your freebies in this Roblox game:

  • Launch Luck Incremental and wait for this experience to load.
  • After that, click on the Gear icon on the left side of your screen to open the Settings menu.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem in the menu that pops up.
  • Hit the Enter button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Luck Incremental Codes

The developers of Luck Incremental may add more promo codes in the future, and we will update our guide if this happens. You can bookmark this article and check it from time to time for new coupons. Also, you can follow the official Luck Incremental media:

  • Discord Server
  • Roblox Group

item.title: 6 Out of 13 World of Warcraft Classes Are Basically Immune to Legion Remix's Biggest Flaw
item.description:
In the two weeks since its launch, World of Warcraft: Legion Remix has been a huge hit. While plenty of players are still making their way through the campaign and Heroic dungeons, hardcore fans are slamming their faces into the hardest content in the game. Some World of Warcraft players have been able to capitalize on the Infinite Power scaling of Legion Remix to push Mythic Keystone dungeons of over +100.

Unfortunately, there is a fact these impressive Legion Remix feats have highlighted: tanks are totally broken. Most teams pushing Mythic+ Keystone dungeons consist primarily of tanks, as most DPS specializations struggle to survive at that high of a level, and few healers can put out the required damage. Blizzard has implemented buffs to help alleviate these problems, but it seems like the six World of Warcraft classes who can play the tank role will continue to win out for the foreseeable future.

Legion Remix Exposes a Major Flaw in WoW Class Design

How Tanks are Dominating World of Warcraft: Legion Remix Right Now

During Legion Remix Phase 1, a group of Chinese players consisting of Erxi, Lhfs, Ruancool, Addhh, and Feifei were able to clear the Black Rook Hold dungeon at a Mythic +113 difficulty after capping out their Infinite Power in World of Warcraft: Legion Remix . The team consisted of a Protection Paladin, Protection Warrior, Vengeance Demon Hunter â€“ all tank specs â€“ along with two Unholy Death Knight DPS. While no other groups have come close to topping their achievement yet, one thing is shared with all other high keys: the parties consist primarily of tanks, without a healer in sight.

Out of the 39 World of Warcraft specializations (40 with the release of Devourer Demon Hunter in Midnight), only 6 are tanks: Blood Death Knight, Vengeance Demon Hunter, Guardian Druid, Protection Paladin, Brewmaster Monk, and Protection Warrior.

This is because, with infinite scaling, most hazards are more liable to one-shot characters, leaving no chance for a healer to do their job. Additionally, with limited damage options, healer classes are dead weight, and while DPS can put out stellar parses, their lower survivability makes most specs a liability.

Luckily, World of Warcraft saw this problem, and has tried to address it. In one of its hotfixes for WoW: Legion Remix Phase 2's launch on October 21, Blizzard added new buffs in Mythic+ dungeons that increase health, damage, and healing done by DPS and healers, while reducing their damage taken:

  • Gift of Eternus: Slayer â€“ Eternus grants damage dealers 10% increased damage done, 100% increased health, and 33% decreased damage taken.
  • Gift of Eternus: Savior â€“ Eternus grants healers 10% increased damage done, 10% increased healing and absorbs, 100% increased health, and 33% decreased damage taken.
  • Gift of Eternus: Protector â€“ Eternus grants tanks 10% increased healing received from other players.

That said, this may not be enough to end the tank roleâ€™s stranglehold on the Legion Remix arms race. Even with functionally unlimited scaling, these flat percentage buffs will most likely not let healers or most DPS keep up with their tanking counterparts. Itâ€™s too soon to say how these changes will affect the meta, but bigger swings might need to be made in order to make these other classes in World of Warcraft: Legion Remix competitive.

This World of Warcraft Problem Isnâ€™t Restricted to Legion Remix

Sadly, the state of affairs in Legion Remix is an exaggerated example of a problem found elsewhere in World of Warcraft . Even in retail, skilled teams are able to clear lower Mythic+ keys without healers, and tanking in open world and solo content is safer and more efficient than most other specs. While healers and DPS are both optional in some content, tanks are always required for high-end encounters.

Of course, Midnight is making some huge changes to every class in WoW . Unfortunately, these adjustments are focused on combating button bloat and class complexity, rather than the discrepancy between roles. Though their rotations may change, tanks will undoubtedly remain king in Midnight as well.

The dominion of the tank role is endemic to the Holy Trinity. From Overwatch 2 to Final Fantasy 14 , almost every game that uses the three-role classification system of tanks, supports, and DPS always struggles with tank balance. WoW was one of the games that codified the Holy Trinity concept, so it will likely never be able to escape this problem for as long as the MMO exists.

20
9.4 /10

item.title: I'm Already Grieving Halo's October 24 Announcement
item.description:
There's a good chance that we'll be seeing a major announcement at this year's Halo World Championship on October 24, and I can't say I'm particularly excited about it. The Halo event will cover what Halo Studios, formerly known as 343 Industries, has been "working on" since Halo Infinite 's contentious release, and while there's no use in being pessimistic, this upcoming project could signal the end of an era for the franchise.

Halo is inseparable from Xbox in many ways. When Microsoft first joined the console space in 2001, it was fighting an uphill battle: its main competitors, SEGA, Nintendo, and Sony, had all entered the home gaming market earlier, and had thereby established much stronger brand identities. By this point, SEGA already had Sonic , Nintendo had long been pumping out Mario games, and Sony was walking arm-in-arm with Final Fantasy , Metal Gear , and Tekken , not to mention bona-fide first-party titles like Crash Bandicoot .

In other words, Microsoft had to make a name for itself in this new and strange world of interactive entertainment, and so it took a chance on a little game called Halo: Combat Evolved . As we know today, this game would go on to define first-person shooters and multiplayer gaming for the foreseeable future, slingshotting Microsoft toward the top of the gaming ecosystem, and perhaps even saving it from an early defeat.

Halo Studios Is Rumored to Reveal a Halo PS5 Game on October 24

Halo on PlayStation Rumors, Explained

Anyone keyed-in to Microsoft news these past few years is likely more than familiar with its controversial decision to, in effect, bow out of the exclusives business. First, the company had graced PlayStation with the likes of Sea of Thieves and Pentiment â€”beloved and well-made games, to be sure, but not exactly system-sellers. Then, highly-anticipated and platform-defining releases like Indiana Jones and the Great Circle and Forza Horizon 5 migrated to PS5, raising more pressing questions about Microsoft's commitment to exclusives. For many, the port of the first Gears of War to PlayStation earlier this year was the final nail in the coffin for Xbox's exclusivity ambitions.

This track record alone is enough to make a Halo PS5 release plausible, but the prospect seems even more believable in the wake of a cryptic tweet from longtime Halo dataminer grunt.api, featuring little more than a PS5 logo and a subsequent post discussing the Halo World Championship this month. Industry insider Rebs Gaming eventually chimed in, clarifying that grunt.api was hinting at a new Halo game coming to PS5. This new game could be a remake of Halo: Combat Evolved , which has been rumored for quite some time.

The alt text for grunt.api's PS5 logo image reads "Switch" with a red X beside it, suggesting that Nintendo's console may not get this rumored multiplatform Halo game.

As a PlayStation Owner, the Possibility of Halo Coming to PS5 Saddens Me

I transitioned to the PS3 when I was, if memory serves, about thirteen years old. I had previously mained the Xbox 360, though in the wake of PlayStation exclusives like Uncharted 2 , InFamous 2 , and The Last of Us , I was beginning to feel Sony's pull stronger than ever. Years later, I'm happy with my decision to prioritize my digital footprint on PlayStation, which has proven to be an ecosystem much richer in exclusive games.

But still, I have a fondness for Xbox, and I've never wanted the company to fail. The reality is, I grew up with Halo just like everyone else my age: it wasn't a perfect franchise, but a new Halo always felt like an event, a big, triumphant swing by Xbox. At the very least, each modern Halo would prompt me to dust off my Xbox 360, and eventually my Xbox One; I always had a decent time with the franchise, at the very least. But if it comes to Sony, it won't be Xbox's crown jewel anymore. Rather, it'll just be another cross-platform shooter, now directly competing with the Call of Duty s and Fortnite s of the world. If this happens, I'm not entirely confident that Halo will survive, which would be a great tragedy regardless of your side in the Console Wars.

20
8.1 /10
9 /10

Halo Infinite

When all hope is lost and humanityâ€™s fate hangs in the balance, the Master Chief is ready to confront the most ruthless foe heâ€™s ever faced. Step inside the armor of humanityâ€™s greatest hero to experience an epic open-world adventure and explore the massive scale of the Halo ring.

With Network Campaign Co-Op and Mission Replay, you can relive your favorite moments, rediscover collectibles and explore the wonders of Zeta Halo on your own or with up to three other fireteam members.

Experience Haloâ€™s celebrated multiplayer reimagined and free-to-play! With over 70 maps in matchmaking, billions of customization configurations, and countless community Forge creations to experience, Halo Infinite is the franchiseâ€™s most expansive multiplayer offering to date.

Enjoy an unprecedented variety of gameplay experiences, ranging from fast-paced intense ranked modes to whimsical mayhem in Custom Games, or even co-operative coordination in the wave-based survival mode Firefight: King of the Hill. Assemble your Fireteam and conquer every mode â€“ Halo offers endless opportunities for teamwork, strategy, and unforgettable victories.
